prompts: Create a Pokemon that has a unique shape and can adapt its type to different environments.
Show me a creature with a sleek design, featuring a mix of colors that represent technology and nature.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that can transform its abilities based on its surroundings and challenges.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies both strength and versatility, with distinct visual traits that stand out.
Design a Pokemon with a futuristic appearance, showcasing elements of both power and elegance.
Make a creature that thrives in various habitats and has multiple types to choose from.
Give me a Pokemon that can represent the balance between nature and technology, with an intricate design.

distinctive_features: A mechanical appearance in certain areas
